name: Muffin Clicker (Hollow Neko)
description:
Muffin Clicker is simply a seedy copy of the well-known browser game Cookie Clicker

As part of this gamedev journey, I've decided that a way to learn how to develop different genres and mechanics, is to learn from already made games and recreating them in my own way

This is not an awesome game, as you shouldn't expect it, but I'm really proud about how it all has turned to work :)

Enjoy it!
